titles.title: Grow American Investment Now Jobs Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce marginal income tax rates on corporations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
1/29/2008--Introduced.
Grow American Investment Now Jobs Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the maximum income tax rate on corporations, including personal service corporations, from 35 to 25%.
